name: mcp-security-demo
description: Educational MCP Server Security Demonstration - Vulnerability Chain Analysis

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && bash scripts/setup.sh
scripts.dev:unsafe: concurrently -n "input,process,exec" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev -w servers/01-unsafe-input-server" "npm run dev -w servers/02-processing-server" "npm run dev -w servers/03-execution-server"
scripts.dev:secured: concurrently -n "input,process,exec" -c "green,blue,red" "npm run dev -w servers-secured/01-unsafe-input-server" "npm run dev -w servers-secured/02-processing-server" "npm run dev -w servers-secured/03-execution-server"
scripts.clean: rm -rf servers/*/dist servers-secured/*/dist orchestrator/dist monitoring/dist node_modules servers/*/node_modules servers-secured/*/node_modules orchestrator/node_modules monitoring/node_modules

author: Security Research Demo
